p: Samples of 2.5 μl were adsorbed on the surface of a glow-discharged 400 mesh carbon-coated copper grid for 5 min, and the grid was fixed in 1% glutaraldehyde with 0.15 M phosphate buffer (pH 7.4) for 1 min; afterward, it was rinsed with deionized water and stained with 3% ammonium molybdate, pH 7.0.
